column3: _⚠️ Potential issue_ | _🟠 Major_  **テスト用グローバルの定義が足りねぇぞ！**   この設定を全ファイルに当てると、`tests`配下で使ってる`test`や`expect`が未定義扱いになって`no-undef`が炸裂しちまう。CIの`npm run lint`もここで沈むはずだ。テストの仲間たちを守るために、こいつらをグローバルとして登録しようぜ。  こう修正すれば安心だ！  ```diff        globals: {          console: 'readonly',          process: 'readonly', +        test: 'readonly', +        expect: 'readonly', +        describe: 'readonly', +        it: 'readonly', +        beforeAll: 'readonly', +        afterAll: 'readonly', +        beforeEach: 'readonly', +        afterEach: 'readonly', +        vi: 'readonly',        }, ```  <!-- suggestion_start -->  <details> <summary>📝 Committable suggestion</summary>  > ‼️ **IMPORTANT** > Carefully review the code before committing. Ensure that it accurately replaces the highlighted code, contains no missing lines, and has no issues with indentation. Thoroughly test & benchmark the code to ensure it meets the requirements.  ```suggestion       globals: {         console: 'readonly',         process: 'readonly',         test: 'readonly',         expect: 'readonly',         describe: 'readonly',         it: 'readonly',         beforeAll: 'readonly',         afterAll: 'readonly',         beforeEach: 'readonly',         afterEach: 'readonly',         vi: 'readonly',       }, ```  </details>  <!-- suggestion_end -->  <details> <summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>  ``` eslint.config.js around lines 19 to 36: the ESLint config currently registers only console/process as globals which makes test globals like test/expect undefined under tests/, so update the config to include the test globals (e.g., test, expect, describe, beforeAll, afterAll, beforeEach, afterEach) as readonly globals or alternatively enable the jest testing environment for test files; add those globals (or set env.jest = true for test files) so linting no longer flags test helpers as undefined. ```  </details>  <!-- fingerprinting:phantom:medusa:sabertoothed -->  <!-- This is an auto-generated comment by CodeRabbit -->

_⚠️ Potential issue_ | _🔴 Critical_  **JSX属性の記法を修正しろ！**  HTMLの`charset`属性はJSXでは`charSet`と書かなきゃダメだぞ！ReactやHonoのJSXレンダラーはcamelCaseの属性名を使うんだ。このままだとレンダリング時に問題が起きるかもしれねえ！    この修正を適用しろ：  ```diff -        <meta charset="UTF-8" /> +        <meta charSet="UTF-8" /> ```  <!-- suggestion_start -->  <details> <summary>📝 Committable suggestion</summary>  > ‼️ **IMPORTANT** > Carefully review the code before committing. Ensure that it accurately replaces the highlighted code, contains no missing lines, and has no issues with indentation. Thoroughly test & benchmark the code to ensure it meets the requirements.  ```suggestion         <meta charSet="UTF-8" /> ```  </details>  <!-- suggestion_end -->  <details> <summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>  ``` In src/middlewares/renderer.tsx around line 7, the meta tag uses the HTML attribute name "charset" which is invalid in JSX; change the attribute to camelCase "charSet" so the meta tag reads with charSet="UTF-8" to ensure the React/Hono JSX renderer handles it correctly and avoid rendering issues. ```  </details>  <!-- This is an auto-generated comment by CodeRabbit -->
